1.title: My gfs feets

11.content:
In a place far away, in a time long ago. There was a group of people called "Der Fussers(The Footers)". In this place, the amount of men and women are the same. Each are paired at birth. Let's follow a young couple, shale we? There's a boy and girl, their names are Jamie and Jen. You what the funny thing is, they're both fussers. Anyways, one day, I think it was a Monday, in an undisclosed, they were to meet. "Jamie this is Jenny, Jenny this Jamie." said the perents. Jen had to wear flip-flops and also had to do her nails. She had them painted a beautiful sky blue Just for him. "Jamie, I did my nails for you, you like them?" Jen said. "Yes, I love them, mind if look at your feet?" Jamie said. "Sure, you can play with them to if you want." Jen said. Jamie was nerves about playing with her feet. He didn't know what to do. "Um, Jen, I don't know how." he said. "Look it's easy, just take my foot/feet into your hands and rub them." Jen said. So Jamie grabbed Jen's left foot and started rubbing her foot. She groaned softly as he did. "Wow, your a pro at this aren't ya?" Jen said. "No, I learn fast. You have really soft feet. Man, I want to kiss them so bad" Jamie said as he kissed her feet. "Hmm, that feels good, don't stop. I'm glad they picked you for me. Uh yes, the toes." Jen said. He(Jamie) sucked on her(Jen's) toes. That sealed the deal for those two. And from then on out, they loved each other forever.
I want to thank you for reading, this is Bigguy signing out.
